description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b3338","text":"The purpose of this procedure is to isolate eggs from livers collected from mice infected with Schistosoma mansoni. This protocol ensures a sterile prep of eggs to be used for culture of eggs and/or collection and culture of sporocysts, and snail infection. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":95,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ao3e","text":"Livers should be placed on ice, following mouse perfusion. This protocol is for up to 5 livers only. (i.e. for 20 livers 4 tubes containing 5 processed livers are used, and for 18 livers 2 tubes containing 5 livers each plus 2 tubes containing 4 livers each are used).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1isnb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cil53","text":"All steps should be performed in a sterile, cleaned tissue culture hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cuhod","text":"BIOMAT 2 Class 2 Microbiological Safety Cabinet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9u49p","text":"Rocking incubator at 37°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dj0qi","text":"Lamp or other light source","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d7mk6","text":"Pipette boy","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"45g87","text":"Tweezers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btqlm","text":"Parafilm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24ggp","text":"2ml status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1nu2q","text":"In tissue culture hood, prepare three petri dishes with 1x DPBS+2% anti-anti, one with 70% ethanol, and one clean petri dish arranged in the following order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l7fq","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5lctq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"673DF2C0D88011EDB55CBBADB4C4A59A","height":260,"id":363874,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mdmebdu5f.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mdmcbdu5f.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/mdmdbdu5f.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mdmbbdu5f.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qcsg","text":"Decant the livers into the first petri dish using ethanol-cleaned tweezers to submerge and continuously move them for 1 minute to ensure complete saturation of the tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45mcm","text":"Repeat step 3 for each petri dish with the exception of the 70% ethanol dish which should be submerged and rinsed for less than 10 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bock","text":"Place all livers into a clean petri dish and using a sterile scalpel finely mince them","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgk3q","text":"Transfer the minced livers to a 50ml falcon tube, re-suspend in 40ml of 1x DPBS + 2% anti-anti and label with necessary identifying information","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ncae","text":"Weigh out 0.05g of collagenase into a labelled 15ml falcon tube and add 10ml of dH20. Mix well (The amount of collagenase to prepare depends on the number of livers to be processed – collagenase is always prepared fresh)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":82,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89egv","text":"Add 5ml of 0.5% collagenase solution to the liver suspension and mix well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0uqn","text":"Optional: Add to the mix 500 ul of polymixin B (100K Units) (Sigma-Aldrich, P4932-1MU), a gram negative bactericidal antibiotic that reduce LPS contamination in the egg prep, in particular when SEA will be prepared from eggs and immunological studies or co-culture with cells, will be performed","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5iat3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qsb8","text":"Wrap securely in parafilm and secure the tube horizontally in a 37°C rocker overnight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bjv1","text":"The following day, centrifuge the liver suspension tube at 400g for 5 min (acceleration and deceleration 9)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8cafi","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and re-suspend in 50ml of 1x DPBS + 2% anti-anti.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2rsan","text":"Repeat steps 9-10 three more times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sgfb","text":"After the final aspiration, re-suspend the pellet in 25ml of 1x DPBS + 2% anti-anti","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1t1b0","text":"Using a 50ml stripette, pass the suspension through the 250uM sieve into a 1L sterile beaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ci494","text":"Pass this filtrate through the 150uM sieve into a second 1L sterile beaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"do3nq","text":"Wash the beaker with 5ml of 1x DPBS + 2% anti-anti to collect any remaining eggs and add this to the filtrate by passing through the 150uM sieve","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etk0s","text":"Decant the filtrate into a 50ml falcon tube and centrifuge (400g, 5 minutes, acceleration and deceleration 9)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4536q","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and resuspend in 10ml 1x DPBS + 2% anti-anti","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7gclu","text":"Prepare a Percoll gradient (one percoll gradient per 5 livers):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fqb9","text":"Very carefully pipette the resuspended eggs onto the surface of the Percoll gradient around the circumference to create a defined layer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58ufe","text":"Prepare a 0.25M sucrose solution (4.27g sucrose + 50ml diH2O) and filter the solution through 0.22um syringe filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":58,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jr53","text":"In 50ml falcon tube mix 8ml Percoll and 32ml of the 0.25M sucrose solution. Invert 5 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck7tc","text":"Centrifuge the gradient at 800g for 10 minutes (acceleration 2 and deceleration 1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duoq","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and re-suspend in 10ml of 1x DPBS + 2% anti-anti. Transfer to a 15ml falcon tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"48jf","text":"Centrifuge at 400g for 5 min (acceleration and deceleration 9)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"36brq","text":"Repeat steps 21-22 two more times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dqgi","text":"IMPORTANT. Check the eggs under microscope, if the prep is still ‘dirty’ or ‘contaminated with liver debris’ proceed with a second percoll gradient","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":147},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":147}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"epi0f","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 10ml 1x DPBS + 2% anti-anti and count 12 aliquots of 5µl to estimate total number of collected eggs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3li8q","text":"Centrifuge eggs in falcon tube at 400g for 5 mins (acceleration and deceleration 9)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck2h8","text":"Resuspend eggs in adult media (DMEM + 10% FBS + 2% anti-anti) and transfer to 6 well plates (5-6ml of media per well)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qa2f","text":"Keep eggs in culture at 37°C and 5% CO2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":38,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u4a","text":"Eggs can be kept in culture for up to ~10 days and retain the ‘hatchability’ however, the hatching rate will drop over time","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":123}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnf8a","text":"Centrifuge eggs in falcon tube at 400g for 5 mins (acceleration and deceleration 9)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8f75r","text":"In the culture hood, aspirate supernatant and re-suspend in 6ml diH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":67,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39qmn","text":"Aliquot 1ml each in a 24 well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7h55i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7vl6","text":"It is important to use 24 well plate given the miracidia get more diluted in 12 or 6 well plate and more egg shells are picked up when collecting the miracidia)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":160}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3oest","text":"Rinse the original falcon tube with 6 ml of water and distribute 1 ml to each well containing 1ml of eggs (i.e. the eggs will be in 2ml of water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"80gdm","text":"Place under light for hatching","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"47g90","text":"At 30-40 min intervals over ~3 hrs, gently remove the top 1ml of water containing the miracidia into a 50ml falcon tube and top up the wells with 1ml of diH2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":156,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehh3e","text":"Count miracidia and proceed with snail infections dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.36wgqjkkxvk5/v1 or sporocyst transformation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":48}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AB7DA520D88211EDBD640A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.36wgqjkkxvk5/v1"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"frro8","text":"Place the tube containing miracidia on ice for ~20 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"gsbp","text":"Centrifuge at 800g for 15min (acceleration and deceleration 9)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8uin5","text":"Quickly aspirate the water and resuspend the pellet of miracidia in complete sporocyst media\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3odsq","text":"Sporocysts can be kept in culture at 28°C with malaria gas (90-92% N, 5% CO2, 3-5% O2) in a sealed container changing the media once to twice a week\n","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":75,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":84,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db7er","text":"IMPORTANT. To avoid contamination always replace the media with fresh complete media the day after transformation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Isolation of Schistosoma mansoni eggs, miracidia, and sporocysts for in vitro cultivation
title_html: Isolation of Schistosoma mansoni eggs, miracidia, and sporocysts for in vitro cultivation
